newsitem.title: USA: Western Resources signs China Power pact.
newsitem.headline: Western Resources signs China Power pact.

text.p: Western Resources Inc said Tuesday it signed an agreement with China Power International Holdings Ltd covering its participation in several coal-fired power development projects.

Western Resources will will be a partner in the projects with generating capacities totaling more than 2,000 metawatts of low-cost power production. The projects will be in the central provinces of China.

Western Resources, a diversified energy company, said the agreement may ultimately involve acquisition and construction in generating assets of $500 million at five or more coal-fired power plants, including the option to expand the capacity of existing plants.
China Power International is the international subsidiary of China Power Investment Corp, a principal power company within the People's Republic of China.
